# langsmith_tag_key (Resource)

Manages a LangSmith tag key.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_tag_key" "example" {
  key         = "environment"
  description = "Deployment environment tag"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) The tag key name.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the tag key.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the tag key was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the tag key.
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the tag key was last updated.
